task.title: How to divide numbers
task.shortdesc: This section demonstrates how to use the division feature of The Smart Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully divide numbers, you need to know what division is.

result.p: The result of the division is displayed.

example.p: If you want to divide 20 by 4, the equation will look like: 20รท4=5. You enter 20, select division symbol, enter 4, and then select equal. The result 5 appears on the screen.
